name: Wigwam Ultra Cool-Lite Low Socks - Unisex
description: Socks for activities that demand dry feet. These quick-drying socks use a fabric blend that wicks moisture and reduces odour. The lightly cushioned sole keeps your feet comfortable for long days on the trail.Made of stretch nylon, polyester, X2O® acrylic, spandex and Tencel®.X2O® contains chitosan for natural antimicrobial and anti-mould characteristics.Ultimax® moisture-control technology moves sweat to high-evaporation areas to keep your feet dry and comfortable.Cushioned sole lets you put in long days on the trail.Seamless toe closure keeps your feet blister-free.
